name: THE BOX FAN
description:
It may or may not be Halloween and you may or may not satiate your childhood curiousity with... THE BOX FAN.

Minimum Requirements:
  • Oculus Rift DK2 or better
  • Leap Motion
Recommended Requirements:
  • A physical box fan, placed on a table and turned on
  • Oculus Rift DK2 camera placed on top of box fan
  • Start a few feet away from the fan
